DVD menu in YouTube

28 Oct 2011

Today a friend of mine posted an article about a very neat idea. He created a DVD-like menu with several YouTube clips.

Just take a look:

This idea is beatiful: It is simple, but it didn't come to my mind before. I knew overlays and saw them sometimes, but I never saw them being used in such a nice way.

Great work, René!
